task.title: Fix spawned worker Relaycast identity registration mismatch

events.content: Remove broker-side worker pre-registration in Relaycast: Remove broker-side worker pre-registration in Relaycast

raw.question: Remove broker-side worker pre-registration in Relaycast
raw.chosen: Remove broker-side worker pre-registration in Relaycast
raw.reasoning: Pre-claiming names via /v1/agents/spawn races with worker MCP registration and can force suffix identities; worker session should own its Relaycast identity.

retrospective.summary: Removed broker-side worker pre-registration to prevent Relaycast name conflicts; enforced strict worker MCP agent naming; rebuilt broker binary and validated all Rust tests pass.
